name: coderipper
description: CodeRipper - Enterprise AI-Powered Code Editor & Compiler

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "web,exec" -c "cyan,green" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:exec || echo Exec-engine not available"
scripts.dev:exec: cd services/exec-engine && go mod download && go run .
scripts.build:exec: cd services/exec-engine && go mod download && go build -o exec-engine.exe .

author: CodeRipper Team
